channel.title: Interactive Media
channel.description: So I have a few options for some classes this year. I want to take Interactive Media Senior year but I'm not really sure about it. I think I've got some really good ideas to do but I have no talent in art at all. I think that a few programs are used this year such as photoshop, adobe, etc. There's also a lot of work with animation which I like. So I just wanted to ask if this might be good for a profession or if it's any fun at all.

item.title: Interactive Media
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

So I have a few options for some classes this year.
I want to take Interactive Media Senior year but I’m not really sure about it. I think

wanted to ask if this might be good for a profession or if it’s any fun at all.
